name: Baby Blobby
description:
Baby Blobby's lab is under attack from the sinister Doom Blobs!

Survive the onslaught for 150 seconds! 

Controls:
use arrow keys to move
use SPACE to fire in red and yellow forms 

collect barrels to evolve, but watch out for poison! 

Game is uploaded as a .zip, containing the .exe and .pck files 

Enjoy! Please let me know if anything doesn't work or of any bugs!
